name: Ambulance Rescue Driver 3d 2016: free game
description:
Ambulance rescue driver 3d 2016 ia a vehicle simulation game which is going to give you best driving simulation experience ! you never has before .
Ambulance rescue driver 3d is going to give you real simulation so you can enjoy real driving while sitting at your sofa. but its not only about driving but also it has been implemented lots of modern driving concepts to improve your driving skills at road.
You have to rescue injured from this large busy traffic city. On daily basis we registered lots of accident cases in the city and also we have to provide services at near highway. rescue the people according to time limit is not as much easy as it was used to be. so be sharp and drive carefully as you have to rescue lots of people.
